    • noAppointmentOverlap

      public static boolean noAppointmentOverlap(ZonedDateTime zdt, String customerID, String appointmentID)
      Checks to see if a customers saved appointment might have overlaps with another appointment of theirs
      Parameters:
      zdt - The ZonedDateTime for the new appointment
      customerID - The customer who we're checking against
      appointmentID - The appointment ID, if any. Helps us determine if we're updating or adding a new appointment.
      Returns:
      true if there is no overlap
